title: IBD chief strategist unplugged… plus expert shares investing secrets of the ultra-wealthy (Ep. 659)
itunes:title: IBD chief strategist unplugged… plus expert shares investing secrets of the ultra-wealthy
description: I have a jam-packed show for you today… with two incredible guests. First, I speak with Richard C. Wilson, founder and CEO of The Family Office Club [15:39]. Richard focuses on ultra-wealthy clients and works with hundreds of successful entrepreneurs.   Even though most of us aren’t in this exclusive club, there’s a lot to take away from the investing ideas his group is looking at now… and the common characteristics you find in successful entrepreneurs.   I also welcome Chris Gessel, chief strategy officer at Investor’s Business Daily (IBD) [50:13]. Chris specializes in market timing… Today he breaks down his strategies for uncovering—and timing—winning growth stocks.
